channel.title: Where to begin
channel.description:
Yeah this question again, I wan't to start a coding a rsps with a "clean" base like hyperion or runesource or something like it. The thing is I just can't figure which one to pick and when you look at the download sections there are so many different versions to choose from. My Java knowledge intermediate but I'm always willing to learn more. So I ask you what I should do
Start with hyperion,runesource or even start with a clean PI?
It's just that I want to have the knowledge to be able to contribute to the community instead of leeching my way to succes.

item.title: Where to begin
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

KroniKz_:

You cant leech your way to success

Also, Shard Revolution might be a viable alternative for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Where to begin
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

I thank you, for using the words Hyperion. Do not touch Project Insanity, It’s full of shit code and its basically a load of shit.

[size=99pt]H Y P E R I O N[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Where to begin
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

You cant leech your way to success, and I personally love Hyperion.

Read full topic
